Excerpt: The label of the switch button that controls whether the play link is an excerpt.
Start time: Label for the excerpt start time field.
End time: Label for the excerpt end time field.
Scenario: Label for the excerpt scenario field.
Auto-highlight: The label of the switch button that controls whether the play link should be auto-highlighted.
Highlight the link when the current medi: The tooltip of the switch button that controls whether the play link should be auto-highlighted.
Time: Label for the time field of seek links.
Block: Label for the block field of page and toggle links.
Page: Label for the page field of page links.
Action: Label for the action field of toggle and fullscreen links.
Play: Label for the play option of the type dropdown.
Pause: Label for the pause option of the type dropdown.
Stop: Label for the stop option of the type dropdown.
Seek: Label for the seek option of the type dropdown.
Show/hide a block: Label for the toggle option of the type dropdown.
Fullscreen: Label for the fullscreen option of the type dropdown.
URL: Label for the url option of the type dropdown.
Show: Label for the show option of the toggle action dropdown.
Hide: Label for the hide option of the toggle action dropdown.
Toggle: Label for the toggle options of the action dropdowns.
Enter: Label for the enter option of the fullscreen action dropdown.
Exit: Label for the exit option of the fullscreen action dropdown.
Set value to current media time: Tooltip for the timecode toolbar in button
Set current media time to this value: Tooltip for the timecode toolbar out button
Clear value: Tooltip for the timecode toolbar clear button
